Sentencas: Insights into the pore-matrix interactions in solid oxide electrolytes are necessary to develop high-efficiency solid oxide electrolytic cells.
Titulo: Evolution and effect on electrolysis performance of pores in YSZ electrolyte films prepared by screen-printing

Sentencas: The role of particle size in ink and printed electrolyte films was analyzed in this study.
Titulo: Evolution and effect on electrolysis performance of pores in YSZ electrolyte films prepared by screen-printing

Sentencas: This is distinct from solid electrolytes that are dense as a whole but have micropores.
Titulo: Evolution and effect on electrolysis performance of pores in YSZ electrolyte films prepared by screen-printing

Sentencas: Herein, we demonstrate that the organic binder in the ink can significantly reduce the number of closed pores in the electrolyte by taking advantage of its thermal softening characteristics.
Titulo: Evolution and effect on electrolysis performance of pores in YSZ electrolyte films prepared by screen-printing

Sentencas: Electron microscopic analysis provides evidence that the binder controls the pore generation and affects the pore distribution in the electrolyte films.
Titulo: Evolution and effect on electrolysis performance of pores in YSZ electrolyte films prepared by screen-printing

Sentencas: The effect and mechanism of micropores in the electrolyte on the electrochemical process (when used for high-temperature steam electrolysis) are discussed.
Titulo: Evolution and effect on electrolysis performance of pores in YSZ electrolyte films prepared by screen-printing
